feed.title: Ganymede Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.0.3
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

What's Changed

  • feat(frontend): jump to timestamp when click on chat histogram by @vicente-higino in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/585
  • build(deps): bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go/modules/postgres from 0.34.0 to 0.35.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/586
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-playground/validator/v10 from 10.23.0 to 10.24.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/587
  • fix(frontend): disable refetching some queries on window focus by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/591
  • build(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.1.1 to 6.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/594
  • use arm64 runners by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/592\
  • Docker builds are sooo much faster now.
  • fix: use pull_request in tests by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/597
  • feat(platform/twitch): log warning if ratelimit exceeds threshold by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/596
  • A warning will be displayed if nearing Twitch API rate limit.
  • fix(live): move set live to after stream archive is started by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/601
  • feat: hide processing videos in "recently archived" section by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/606
  • Videos that are still be archived no longer appear in the "recently archived" section.
  • build: bump frontend package versions by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/607
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.15.0 to 0.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/603
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/riverdriver/riverpgxv5 from 0.15.0 to 0.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/604
  • Miscellaneous fixes for 4.0.3 by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/609
  • build: push pr image on pr build by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/610
  • Pull requests now have a Docker image built for testing (:pr-XXX)
  • build: add image annotations by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/611

New Contributors

  • @vicente-higino made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/585

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.0.2...v4.0.3

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.0.4
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

Notable Changes

  • Add a toggle in the frontend user settings to display processing videos in the "recently archived" page.
  • Overhaul the storage migration logic.
  • Changing storage templates is a lot safer now. If the move fails the changes are rolled back and an error logged in the container logs.
  • Fix postgres database health check. You will need to make the following change to the postgres service to fix the health check ```diff ganymede-db: container_name: ganymede-db image: postgres:14 volumes:
    • ./ganymede-db:/var/lib/postgresql/data environment:
    • POSTGRES_PASSWORD=PASSWORD
    • POSTGRES_USER=ganymede
    • POSTGRES_DB=ganymede-prd ports:
    • 4801:5432 restart: unless-stopped healthcheck:
  • test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready", "-d", "{{ ganymede_db_name }}"]
  • test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U $${POSTGRES_USER} -d $${POSTGRES_DB}"] interval: 30s timeout: 60s retries: 5 start_period: 60s ```

What's Changed

  • feat(frontend): add settings to display processing video in recently archived by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/617
  • build(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.2.0 to 6.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/621
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.25.0 to 0.26.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/622
  • build(deps): bump riverqueue.com/riverui from 0.7.0 to 0.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/624
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.32.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/623
  • fix: bump TwitchDownloader version to 1.55.2 by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/626
  • build(deps): bump github.com/sethvargo/go-envconfig from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/629
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-playground/validator/v10 from 10.24.0 to 10.25.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/630
  • build(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.3.2 to 6.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/633
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.16.0 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/638
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/riverdriver/riverpgxv5 from 0.16.0 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/639
  • fix(task): overhaul storage migration task by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/636
  • fix: compose postgres healthcheck by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/640

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.0.3...v4.0.4

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.0.5
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.33.0 to 0.35.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/641

  • build(deps): bump frontend packages by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/651
  • build(deps): bump entgo.io/ent from 0.14.2 to 0.14.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/653
  • build(deps): bump riverqueue.com/riverui from 0.8.0 to 0.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/654

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.0.4...v4.0.5

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.1.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

Features

  • Add a "videos" page. This page is similar to a channel's videos page but shows all videos in your instance.

What's Changed

  • fix: pwchange typo by @Marco98 in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/670
  • fix(frontend/chatplayer): track processed chat ids to prevent duplicates by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/671
  • Navbar search fix by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/680
  • feat(frontend): videos page by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/681
  • fix(live notifications): get correct lastest vod for live notification by @vicente-higino in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/685
  • fix(utils): handle more illegal characters in file names by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/686

Dependencies

  • build(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.21.0 to 1.21.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/666
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/665
  • build(deps): bump github.com/gavv/httpexpect/v2 from 2.16.0 to 2.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/663
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.27.0 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/664
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/668
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/rivertype from 0.18.0 to 0.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/674
  • build(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.5.0 to 6.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/676
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/riverdriver/riverpgxv5 from 0.18.0 to 0.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/672
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.18.0 to 0.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/675
  • build(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.12.0 to 3.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/673
  • build(deps): bump entgo.io/ent from 0.14.3 to 0.14.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/684
  • build(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.5.1 to 6.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/683
  • build(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.1 to 4.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/688

New Contributors

  • @Marco98 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/670

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.0.5...v4.1.0

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.2.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

New Features

Translations

The web interface now supports i18n/translations. Currently supported languages are English and German. If you would like to add a translation or update strings see the README for more information. A new language button is present on the navbar for switching languages.

Additionally two new environment variables have been added to control the language.

  • SHOW_LOCALE_BUTTON: true/false Show the locale/language button on the navbar (defaults to true).
  • DEFAULT_LOCALE: Sets the default locale/language. Must be the short code of the language. Example: en for English, de for German.

For this update I primarily focused on strings. If you notice anything else that should be localized such as dates, times, or missed strings open a pull request or issue.

Better Quality Selection

Streams and VODs often come with multiple quality options like 720p, 720p60, 1080p, 1080p60, and so on, which can become tedious to manage. To simplify this, the web interface now displays only the resolution (e.g., 1080p) for each quality option. When archiving a video, the system checks the available quality options and selects the closest match to the user's chosen resolution. For instance, if a user selects "720p" and both "720p30" and "720p60" are available, "720p60" will be automatically selected. This only applies if the resolution is not "best" or "audio".

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump next in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/687
  • feat: add category to live notification template variables by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/697
  • build(deps): bump github.com/jackc/pgx/v5 from 5.7.2 to 5.7.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/694
  • build(deps): bump github.com/rs/zerolog from 1.33.0 to 1.34.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/696
  • feat: select closest quality when archiving by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/700
  • fix(frontend/titlebar): update tooltip label format for streamed date and use timezone by @vicente-higino in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/708
  • build(deps): bump github.com/jackc/pgx/v5 from 5.7.3 to 5.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/704
  • build(deps): bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go/modules/postgres from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/705
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-playground/validator/v10 from 10.25.0 to 10.26.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/707
  • build(deps): bump axios from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/710
  • ops: remove custom branch in test by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/711
  • Chat convert out of bounds by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/713
  • feat(frontend): i18n support by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/702
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/riverdriver/riverpgxv5 from 0.19.0 to 0.20.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/715
  • build(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.13.0 to 3.14.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/716
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.19.0 to 0.20.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/718
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/719
  • build: bump go to 1.24 by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/721
  • Fix some typos by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/723
  • Update and extend german frontend translations by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/724
  • fix(tasks): remove fetching sprite thumbnails for twitch by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/726
  • feat(frontend): merge en strings with specified language by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/720
  • Extend german translations by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/728

New Contributors

  • @CompileNix made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/723

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.1.0...v4.2.0
